import React, {Component} from "react"; import FacebookIcon from "../Images/FacebookIcon.png"; import InstagramIcon from "../Images/InstagramIcon.png"; import SnapchatIcon from "../Images/SnapchatIcon.png"; export default class Footer extends Component { /* Include: Back to top of page link Help section - link to returns Social Media Links Copyright track my order - could be linked to the view previous purchases? */ render() { return (

) } }
